messages.content: As a Forces Veteran I know what it means to fight for what you believe in. I trust Labour to fight for a Brexit deal that works for Yorkshire. A deal that secures jobs, wages and controls immigration.
The Tories have never been on our side. We need a strong, independent-minded, Labour MP who will fight our corner.
Only a Labour MP will stand against the Tories' cuts to our schools, our hospitals and our police.
In this election, stand with me and vote for a strong local Labour MP. Together, we can get the best deal for Yorkshire.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight for a Brexit deal that works for Yorkshire, securing jobs, wages and controlling immigration.
Stand against the Tories' cuts to schools, hospitals, and police.

issues.brexitEurope: Fight for a Brexit deal that works for Yorkshire, securing jobs, wages and controlling immigration.
issues.education: Stand against the Tories' cuts to our schools.
issues.health: Stand against the Tories' cuts to our hospitals.

endorsements.endorsement: As a Forces Veteran I know what it means to fight for what you believe in.

images.caption: David Bloomfield - Royal Green Jacket veteran
